scripts.publish:demo: git branch -D gh-pages && git push origin --delete gh-pages; git checkout -b gh-pages && yarn && yarn build && git add . && git add -f dist && git add -f node_modules/uptick-demo-site/dist && git commit -m "Demo site build" && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master && cd .. && git push origin `git subtree split --prefix demo gh-pages`:gh-pages --force && cd demo
